name: Shapes (itch) (PeanutButterStudio)
description:
How fast can you be...?




 Challenge your Mouse/Finger movement skills by trying to reach the end before the big SCARY timer endsssss!!!!!!!!!!!

Featuring:



-31 unique challenging yet fun Levels!!!
  -Levels that change and introduce interesting mechanics  in order to keep the challenge fresh
-A challenging ENDLESS MODEEEEEE!!!!!!!
and last but not least a mobile port!!!!!!!!!


So try now and see if you are truly the fastest Mouse/Finger mover..........
